subject: Poor Engagement with Studies
body: I have noticed that you have missed quite a few sessions in the last two weeks, if there is any other reason that you cannot make them, you will need to come and complete an absence form for us to be able to excuse you from the sessions.

subject: Re-Sit of Failed Modules
body: The Board of Examiners has determined that you have not met the requirements for progression into your nect year of study. In order to be able to progress into your next year of study you are required to resit all assessments listed below.
